resources.string: Welcome to Boolah Explore, this is where it all starts. All you need to do is to swipe left if you like a point or swipe right if you wish to skip over the same. We save your preferences and your daily itinerary is formulated based on your travel preferences and your distances to the same from your current location. The more you swipe the better our results will match your interests. Keep swiping and voila your AI powered itinerary is here.
